changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE abos_sofs_fl.file_metadata ( file_id bigint NOT NULL, deployment_number varchar(3) NOT NULL, delivery_mode varchar(3) NOT NULL, time_coverage_start timestamp with time zone, time_coverage_end timestamp with time zone, date_created timestamp with time zone, CONSTRAINT file_metadata_indexed_file_fk FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES abos_sofs_fl.indexed_file (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT file_metadata_file_id_uc UNIQUE (file_id) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); ALTER TABLE abos_sofs_fl.file_metadata OWNER TO abos_sofs_fl;

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE abos_sofs_fl.timeseries ( deployment_number varchar(3) NOT NULL, mean_latitude double precision, mean_longitude double precision, geom geometry(Geometry,4326), time_deployment_start timestamp with time zone, time_deployment_end timestamp with time zone, CONSTRAINT timeseries_pk PRIMARY KEY (deployment_number) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); ALTER TABLE abos_sofs_fl.timeseries OWNER TO abos_sofs_fl;

changeSet.author: talend
talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE abos_sofs_fl.measurement ( deployment_number varchar(3) NOT NULL, delivery_mode varchar(3) NOT NULL, file_id bigint NOT NULL, index bigint NOT NULL, "TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "LATITUDE" real, "LONGITUDE" real, "PL_CMP" real, "WDIR" real, "WSPD" real, "WIND_H" real, "WIND_FLAG" integer, "ATMP" real, "ATMP_H" real, "ATMP_FLAG" integer, "AIRT" real, "AIRT_H" real, "AIRT_FLAG" integer, "RELH" real, "RELH_H" real, "RELH_FLAG" integer, "TEMP" real, "TEMP_H" real, "TEMP_FLAG" integer, "RAIN_AMOUNT" real, "RAIN_AMOUNT_H" real, "RAIN_AMOUNT_FLAG" integer, "SW" real, "SW_H" real, "SW_FLAG" integer, "LW" real, "LW_H" real, "LW_FLAG" integer, "HS" real, "HL" real, "H_RAIN" real, "TAU" real, "SST" real, "HEAT_NET" real, "MASS_NET" real, "LW_NET" real, "SW_NET" real, "WSPD10M" real, "AIRT1_5M" real, "AIRT2_0M" real, "RELH1_5M" real, "RELH2_0M" real, CONSTRAINT measurement_pk PRIMARY KEY (file_id , index ), CONSTRAINT measurement_file_metadata_fk FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES abos_sofs_fl.file_metadata (file_id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); ALTER TABLE abos_sofs_fl.measurement OWNER TO abos_sofs_fl; COMMENT ON COLUMN abos_sofs_fl.measurement.index IS 'index of measurement in netCDF file';

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW abos_sofs_surfaceflux_rt_map AS SELECT DISTINCT timeseries.* FROM timeseries JOIN file_metadata USING (deployment_number) WHERE delivery_mode = 'RT';

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW abos_sofs_surfaceflux_rt_data AS SELECT measurement.*, timeseries.geom FROM measurement JOIN timeseries USING (deployment_number) WHERE delivery_mode = 'RT' ORDER BY file_id, index;

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW abos_sofs_surfaceflux_dm_map AS SELECT DISTINCT timeseries.* FROM timeseries JOIN file_metadata USING (deployment_number) WHERE delivery_mode = 'DM';

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW abos_sofs_surfaceflux_dm_data AS SELECT measurement.*, timeseries.geom FROM measurement JOIN timeseries USING (deployment_number) WHERE delivery_mode = 'DM' ORDER BY file_id, index;
